query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.name as island_name,
  p.type,
  p.atoll,
  CASE WHEN ig.id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Has Guide' ELSE 'No Guide' END as guide_status,
  ig.id as guide_id
FROM places p
LEFT JOIN island_guides ig ON LOWER(REPLACE(p.name, ' ', '')) = LOWER(REPLACE(ig.name, ' ', ''))
WHERE p.type = 'island'
ORDER BY guide_status, p.atoll, p.name

LEFT JOIN island_guides ig ON LOWER(REPLACE(p.name, ' ', '')) = LOWER(REPLACE(ig.name, ' ', ''))
